name: answer_other_questions
description: Respond to the users request if no other function call is required.

user_message.description: User message to answer. Example: 'hello', 'can bugs think?' .

name: get_city_weather
description: Get the current weather forcast of a city.

city_name.description: The city name to search up live weather data for.

name: get_stock_price
description: Get the latest price of a stock.

symbol.description: The stock symbol to look up.

name: get_news
description: Gets the latest news from RSS feeds.

num_of_articles.description: Number of articles to present. Default is 3.

name: create_image
description: Generates a image from the users prompt.

image_prompt.description: Prompt used to generate the image.

name: video_player
description: Get a YouTube search query and play video in chat window.

youtube_query.description: The YouTube search query provided by the user.
